title: THE SIMS COMPLETE COLLECTION GAME ITSELF
description:
FINALLY!
I've been working on this for months to get EVERYTHING FOR THE SIMS to work!

Guess what everyone? YOU CAN NOW PLAY THIS ON WINDOWS 8!

Some people are asking," how did you get passed the installation?" That's just it. I didn't! I installed it on another computer and moved it to a flash drive and so on and since it's a cracked game you don't have to worry about it being in the system itself!

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE! READ THE READ ME!!! 
Don't worry about the damn password... I tried to upload the rar file with a txt file with the password, but it didn't go thru. So fuck it. If it comes up asking for a password then guess where to look.

Anything else you need, please contact me thru where I have left contact info in the Read me! 

if I didn't include the crack for the sims Creator it's here also.
 <a href="
http://www.games4theworlddownloads.org/ts1/thesims1creatorfix.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.games4theworlddownloads.org/ts1/thesims1creatorfix.html</a>

find the sims 1>download>read their read me>done

Please don't be stupid. PLEASE do everything I have written in that Read me. 

PLEASE ONLY COME TO ME IF YOU HAVE A LEGIT REASON!!!

-Hero
